lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.
Because your Intellectual sphere status is low, you will have to spend this summer in summer school to make up for it.
Because you have excellent social skills, you will have an exciting summer with your friends, travelling, romancing and probably getting into a bit of trouble.
This is one of those really bad summers where everything is BORING. On top of everything else, it rains almost every day.
